body:
### Who has the Pager?
A simple python webapp for Datasphere dev team members to quickly find out who has pager duties for that particular week, or the week before/after this one.

Based off python code learned in Udacity CS253. Stylesheets are Skeleton, with Datasphere corp branding tweaks.
tagline: Simple (and first!) webapp to see who has P1 and P2 duties for a given week.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Who-has-the-pager-
